title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: Dive into fun!Get ready to beat the heat and make a splash! Summer has never been more fun because a total prize pool of USD 10,000 awaits you! Join the Summer Splash tournament, the newest campaign from Betplay.io and Quickspin! This 7-day network event is jam-packed with entertainment and awards. This is a promotion you definitely don't want to miss, we promise!The entertaining competition will be held on June 15 at 12:01 a.m. GMT+8 to June 21 at 11:59 p.m. GMT+8. For this promotion, the qualifying minimum stake is USD 0.20. More victories boost your chances of ranking higher. Based on the highest single-spin win amount multiplied by the wager, the winners are determined. After the campaign has ended, the winners will be announced within 48 hours. The player's primary wallet will receive the monetary prizes as credit.To join, you can play any of the participating games in the list:•   Adventures Beyond Wonderl•   And Magical Maze•   Hall Of The Mountain King•   Ark Of Mystery•   Cash Truck•   Fairy Gate•   Big Bad Wolf•   Dragon Shrine•   Eastern Emerald•   Genies Touch•   Golden Glyph•   Hidden Valley Hd•   Hammer Of Vulcan•   The Wild Chase•   Wins Of Fortune•   The Grand•   Warp Wreckers Power Glyph•   Raven Rising•   Joker Strike•   Nero's Fortune•   Phoenix Sun•   King Colossus•   Sticky Bandits Trail Of Blood•   Sticky Bandits 3 Most Wanted•   Tigers Glory Ultra•   Sticky Bandits•   Ticket To The Stars•   Tigers GloryLet’s make a splash this summer! If you have any questions concerning the campaign, feel free to contact us via our live chat service.
